item.description:
Dance Days Boston

African Dance!
...with Fanta Keita Tauber
Get in shape while learning both traditional and new dance steps - Arlington, MA


Come join Fanta as we kick up the energy for an hour of pure fun and exercise. Spend your after-work time with us as we dance to traditional Guinean (African) Dance and many NEW forms of dance depending on interest.

Using a dance mix of traditional to current musics, you will follow Fanta as she weaves a class of all ages from 8 to 80! If YOU want to lose some pounds, meet some nice folks, learn some dance moves and get that body moving!

Classes held at The DrumConnectionâ€™s DrumRoom at The Gibbs School, East Arlington at The Arlington Center for The Arts. Easy to find and easier to park.

These will be ongoing walk-in classes. $10 each. Cash, check or charge. Pay for a 10 pack for $75.- and use whenever you want.

We suggest joining Meetup Groups for latest info on our dance classes, any postponements, changes or additional classes.

About this Meetup Group
item.how_to_find_us: Fanta will welcome you with open arms... and a big, warm smile.
item.name: Dance Days Boston Meetups - Arlington
